title: Random game crashes
body: Is it just me or other people getting the leaver status cause their game crash an the client wont load for awhile

replies.body:
It does kinda suck, but if your game crashes and it takes too long to get back in you could still be marked as a "leaver". If it happens enough you could end up getting punished for something caused by crashes, so be sure to try some troubleshooting in a custom or practice game!!

Without knowing too much about what happens, the best I can suggest would be to try to general steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974). Those covers the basics of the usual issues, but be sure to hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if they can't help.

its not just me lately ive had alot of people ive been duoing with that have been having connection issues about the same time but it hasnt happened in a few days so maybe its fixed now idk but i got two leavers just because of it just glad it didnt get any reprimand for it

People have connection issues every day, and for many different reasons. If you can share what type of error you're getting, someone might be able to come up with a solution for you so it doesn't become a problem, and help you avoid that horrible low priority queue.
